post:
Iniz is the ultimate destination providing top quality VPS hosting services. At a affordable budget and customers in mind our VPS hosting services is the best solution with complete control and root access.

Iniz happily operates with four locations with more launching soon, we currently have presence in Amsterdam, Netherlands (Europe) and we cover all 3 parts of United States with enterprise nodes in Los Angeles (West Coast), Chicago (Central), Buffalo & Atlanta (East Coast).

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
All plans include
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
- 5 Day Money Back Guarantee (First order only)
- Enterprise Hardware
- OpenVZ Virtualisation
- Full root access
- Free & Instant Setup
- 1 Dedicated IPv4
- Free IPv6 (Open ticket - NL/LA)
- TUN/TAP/PPP Options

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
NEW AMSTERDAM, NL PLANS
Dual E5-2620 // Hardware RAID10 // Minimum 8 Drive Array
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

We have now joined up with a provider in Amsterdam, NL (Databarn DC). No cost increase, Just 50% or more improvement in...everything!

New Sizzling Hardware:
- Dual E5-2650 8 Core CPUs
- Minimum 8x4TB Enterprise HDDs
- Minimum 80GB ECC RAM
- 2 x 1Gbps LACP - Redundant Network

Coming Soon:
- We have our own ASN (AS62599) and will peer directly with our DCs network 
- Own Brocade BigIron 10GE Switch - We manage null routes and traffic! 
- 2 x 10GE To Core & 2 x 10GE To Servers!

Amazing Performance on SATA Drives:
